pr_title: Mark sonar violation 'Regular expressions should not overflow the stack' as false positive over AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharactersCheck

timeline.bodyText:
Isn't \\\\b mean we are looking for the text string \{binary character}?
Won't putting this directly into [] mean we change the search from the above to looking for the text string \ or the {binary character} and not the combination of the 2?
Imagine if this was just \\n. It is looking for the text string \n not the line control.
timeline.author: rnveach

replies.bodyText: We should have a test case to cover this.
